rangers: Levi Weston-Ninja Steel Gold Ranger-Rhythm Star-105

zords.name: RACER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at the start of a battle. Roll 2 dice an deal that much [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.
rangers: Devon Daniels-Beast Morphers Red Ranger-Quick Wits-106

zords.name: CHOPPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card to allow any Ranger to shuffle their hand into their deck. That Ranger may then draw up to 5 cards.
rangers: Zoey Reeves-Beast Morphers Yellow Ranger-Problem Solver-107

zords.name: WHEELER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at any time. Move up to 2 foot soldier figures from any location to an outer location of your choice.
rangers: Ravi Shaw-Beast Morphers Blue Ranger-Grid Battleforce Training-108

zords.name: WRECKER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at any time. Up to 3 different Rangers may each reveal 1 card from their hand. If there is at least 1 copy of that card in their discard pile, they may place that copy on top of their deck.

zords.name: JET ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at any time. Any Ranger may choose 2 cards from their discard pile and place them on the bottom of their deck, in any order. They may then draw 1 card.
rangers: Steel-Beast Morphers Silver Ranger-Mr. Fantastic Super Handsome Strong as Steel-110

zords.name: BEAST-X KING ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of X. Resolve that card as through they spend +3 [ENERGY] to play it.
rangers: Devon Daniels-Beast Morphers Red Ranger-Quick Wits-106
Zoey Reeves-Beast Morphers Yellow Ranger-Problem Solver-107
Ravi Shaw-Beast Morphers Blue Ranger-Grid Battleforce Training-108
Steel-Beast Morphers Silver Ranger-Mr. Fantastic Super Handsome Strong as Steel-110

zords.name: TIGER CLAW ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card after any Ranger performs an attack. During the next Ranger turn in this battle, instead of playing a card, you may perform an attack with half that many dice (rounded down).
rangers: Izzy Garcia-Dino Fury Green-Eye of the Tiger-111

zords.name: LION HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger performs an attack to convert all O results to [HIT] results.

zords.name: RAM HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger suffers damage to reduce that damage by 3.

zords.name: CERBERUS HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card to deal 1 [HIT] each to up to 3 enemy cards.

zords.name: PHOENIX HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card to allow a Ranger of your choice to choose a card from their discard pile and return it to their hand.

zords.name: SERPENT HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card during a battle to flip up to 2 foot soldier cards face down, as through defeated. (Do not remove any foot soldier figures from that location.)

zords.name: HYDRA HYPER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger discards a card for defense. Place that card on the bottom of their deck. Deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

zords.name: OMEGA RED ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger performs an attack. Add 1 die to that attack. Any Ranger may exhaust another Zord card to add 3 more dice to that attack.
rangers: Jason Lee Scott-Omega Red Ranger-Omega Fire Power-119

zords.name: OMEGA YELLOW ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger suffers damage. Reduce that damage by 2. Any Ranger may exhaust another Zord card to prevent that damage entirely.
rangers: Trini Kwan-Omega Yellow Ranger-Omega Earth Power-121

zords.name: OMEGA BLACK ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when an enemy card is defeated. Gain 1 [ENERGY]. Any Ranger may exhaust another Zord card to gain +3 [ENERGY].
rangers: Zack Taylor-Omega Black Ranger-Omega Air Power-122

zords.name: SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. Gain 3 [ENERGY].
rangers: Ellarien-Violet Solar Ranger-A Light in the darkness-124

zords.name: RED SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger rolls dice for an attack while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. Add 2 dice to that attack. They may reroll any number of dice during that attack.

zords.name: YELLOW SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger rolls at least 1 [HIT] [HIT] result during an attack while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. Add 3 [HIT] to that attack.

zords.name: BLUE SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at the start of any Ranger turn in battle while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. During this turn, any Ranger may play 1 card from their discard pile instead of their hand, then place it on the bottom of their deck.

zords.name: PINK SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card at the end of any Ranger turn in battle while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. The Rangers may take an additional turn after this one.
rangers: Kimberly Ann Hart-Pink Solar Ranger-Rebel Twilight-128

zords.name: BLACK SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger would be defeated while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. Prevent that defeat and any other defeat that Ranger would suffer until the end of the next Ranger turn in this battle.

zords.name: GREEN SOLAR ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card when any Ranger suffers damage while there is no [ENERGY] in the shared energy pool. Reduce that damage by 2. Deal 2 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

zords.name: REINDEER ZORD
zords.ability: Exhaust this card during a battle. Gain 1 [ENERGY]. If any Ranger flips 1 action token face down, you may move any Ranger to an outer location of your choice.

megazords.name: DINO MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. At the start of each battle in the Megazord’s current location, deal 1 [HIT] to each enemy card.

megazords.name: DRAGONZORD BATTLE MODE
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. At the start of each battle in the Megazord’s current location, roll 6 dice and deal that much [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

megazords.name: MEGA DRAGONZORD
megazords.ability: When any Ranger defeats an enemy card with an attack, place a number of hit tokens on this card equal to the amount of excess [HIT]. During each Ranger turn in battle, instead of playing a card, any ranger may remove up to 6 tokens from this card and place them on an enemy card of their choice.

megazords.name: ULTRAZORD
megazords.ability: Once per Ranger turn in battle, any Ranger may exhaust 1 Zord card to deal 3 [HIT] to an enemy card that has resolved.

megazords.name: THUNDER MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Each time any Ranger performs an attack, they may reroll any number of dice once.

megazords.name: THUNDER ULTRAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card after an enemy card deals damage. Deal an amount of [HIT] equal to the number of [SHIELD] on cards discarded for defense as a result of that damage. You may divide the [HIT] from this effect among any number of enemy cards.

megazords.name: DRAGON THUNDERZORD
megazords.ability: Each time a Ranger rolls at least 1 O result during an attack, deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card other than the target.

megazords.name: MEGA TIGERZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. At the end of each battle in that location, roll 5 dice. Deal that much [HIT] divided as you choose among enemy cards.

megazords.name: THUNDER ULTRAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card after an enemy card deals damage. Deal an amount of [HIT] equal to the number of [SHIELD] on cards discarded for defense as a result of that damage. You may divide the [HIT] from this effect among any number of enemy cards.

megazords.name: NINJA MEGAZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: When this card is summoned and at the start of each Action Phase, add 2 energy tokens to this card (max 2). Once per battle, after any Ranger turn, the Rangers may remove 1 token from this card to immediately take another turn.

megazords.name: NINJA MEGAFALCONZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card after any Ranger resolves a card. That Ranger may immediately play that card a second time, ignoring its energy cost, if its energy cost is zero, they may immediately play it a third time.

megazords.name: NINJA ULTRAZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: At the end of each turn in battle, if at least 2 Rangers played cards during that turn, deal 2 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

megazords.name: SHOGUN MEGAZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card when any enemy card deals damage to a Ranger. Prevent all of that damage and deal an equal amount of [HIT] to that enemy card.

megazords.name: SHOGUN MEGAFALCONZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: Each time a Ranger suffers damage, they may discard 1 card from their hand. If they do, reduce that damage by 2 and deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice.

megazords.name: SHOGUN ULTRAZORD
megazords.team: Mighty Morphin or Mighty Morphin Ninja
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at the start of any Ranger turn in battle. Deal 2 [HIT] to each enemy card.

megazords.name: MEGA GRAVEZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to deal 2 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice. If this card is exhausted when any Ranger exhausts another Zord card, reach this card.

megazords.name: ZEO MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. During each battle in the Megazord’s location, reduce the energy cost of all cards by 1.

megazords.name: ZEO MEGA BATTLEZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, add 2 energy tokens to this card (max 2). When any Ranger performs an attack, they may remove 1 energy token from this card to add 3 dice to that attack.

megazords.name: SUPER ZEO MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at the start of a battle. Each time a Ranger performs an attack during that battle, they may divide the [HIT] from that attack among any number of targets.

megazords.name: TURBO MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Each time a Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of X, resolve that card as through they spent +2 [ENERGY].

megazords.name: RESCUE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: After the last enemy turn in each battle, gain 2 [ENERGY]. The Rangers may take an additional turn.

megazords.name: MEGA VOYAGER
megazords.ability: When you summon this card, and at the start of each Action Phase, place 5 energy tokens on this card (max 5). Each time a Ranger suffers damage, you may remove 1 energy token from this card to reduce that damage by 3.

megazords.name: WINGED MEGA VOYAGER
megazords.ability: When you summon this card, and at the start of each Action Phase, place 5 energy tokens on this card (max 5). Each time a Ranger plays a card, they may remove 1 energy token from this card to place that on top of their deck instead of discarding it.

megazords.name: ASTRO MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: During each battle, Rangers may look at the top card of their deck at any time. Once per Ranger turn, a Ranger may swap that card with a card in their hand.

megazords.name: GALAXY MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Once during each Ranger turn in battle, if at least 1 Ranger flips an action token to gain 2 [ENERGY], any Ranger may play an additional attack or maneuver card that turn.

megazords.name: ORION GALAXY MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, add 5 energy tokens to this card (max 5). When any Ranger performs an attack, they may spend up to 2 energy tokens from this card to reduce that attack’s energy cost by an equal amount.

megazords.name: LIGHTSPEED SOLARZORD
megazords.ability: When any Ranger reveals a card with exactly 1 [SHIELD] for defense, that Ranger may either deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice or add +1 [SHIELD] to that card.

megazords.name: TIME FORCE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. At the start of each battle in that location, choose the FAST or GUARD keyword. Rangers may ignore the chosen keyword until the end of battle.

megazords.name: PREDAZORD
megazords.ability: Once per turn, when any Ranger reveals a card for defense, they may choose to gain 1 [ENERGY], deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice, or add 1 [SHIELD] to the revealed card.

megazords.name: THUNDER MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: While this card is in play, the health value of all enemy cards is reduced by 1.

megazords.name: THUNDERSAURUS MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: When this card is summoned and at the start of each round, add 4 energy tokens to this card (max 4). Once per Ranger turn in battle, any Ranger may remove 1 energy token from this card to ready an exhausted Zord card.

megazords.name: DELTA SQUAD MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Once per battle, when an enemy card is defeated, place their deployment card here until the end of the battle. Each time a Ranger performs an attack that targets them during the battle, that Ranger may gain 1 [ENERGY] or reroll any number of dice.

megazords.name: DELTAMAX MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: During each battle, when a foot soldier card is defeated, deal 2 [HIT] to another enemy card.

megazords.name: DELTA COMMAND MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card to place the Megazord token in any location. When any Ranger moves to that location or performs the RECOVER action in that location, they may power up.

megazords.name: TITAN MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: When you summon this card, and at the start of each Action Phase, place 3 energy tokens on this card (max 3). During any Ranger turn in battle, the Rangers may remove 1 token from this card to play both an attack card and a maneuver card.

megazords.name: FLASH POINT MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at any time to palace the Megazord token in any location. Each time a Ranger in that location rolls at least 1 [HIT][HIT] result, that Ranger may return 1 card from their discard pile to the bottom of their deck.

megazords.name: HIGH OCTANE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at the end of any Ranger turn in battle. Gain 2 [ENERGY]. The Rangers may take an additional turn after this one. The next time any Ranger performs an attack during this battle, add 2 dice to that attack.

megazords.name: VALVEMAX MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Place 3 energy tokens on this card at the start of each battle (max 3). After any Ranger plays a card, they may remove 1 energy token from this card to place the played card on the bottom of their deck instead of discarding it and draw 1 card.

megazords.name: ZENITH MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: When this card is summoned and at the start of each action phase place 5 energy tokens on this card. Once during each Ranger attack, you may gain 1 energy token from this card and add 1 die to that attack.

megazords.name: RPM ULTRAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, place 2 energy tokens on this card (max 2). After any Ranger resolves a card, they may remove 1 energy token from this card to immediately play that card a second time, then remove it from the game.

megazords.name: CLAW ARMOR MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at the start of any Ranger turn in battle. Double all [HIT] dealt by Rangers during this turn.

megazords.name: GOSEI GREAT MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card at any time. Each Ranger flips over their deck and discard pile and swaps them without shuffling either.

megazords.name: DINO CHARGE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: During each battle, all Rangers may each use their once-per-battle ability an additional time.

megazords.name: PLESIO CHARGE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each Ranger turn, any Ranger may draw 1 card from the bottom of their deck. Once per turn, with any Ranger draws 1 or more cards, they may deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of their choice.

megazords.name: BULL RIDER MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: While this card is in play, each time a Ranger plays a card with an energy cost of zero, gain 1 [ENERGY].

megazords.name: BEAST-X MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, place 3 energy tokens on this card (max 3). Any Ranger may remove 1 energy token from this card to play 1 card from their discard pile as though it were in their hand. If they do, reduce its energy cost by 1.

megazords.name: BEAST-X KING ULTRAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card after any Ranger resolves a card with an energy cost of X. Return all [ENERGY] spent to play that card to the shared energy pool.

megazords.name: CHRONOS HYPERFORCE MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, each participating Ranger may search their deck or discard pile for a card and add it to their hand. If they do, they must shuffle their deck.

megazords.name: ULTRA OMEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Each time a Ranger exhausts a Zord card, gain 1 [ENERGY] and deal 1 [HIT] to an enemy card of your choice.

megazords.name: SOLAR MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: Exhaust this card during a battle. Gain 7 [ENERGY].

megazords.name: MEGA MEGAZORD
megazords.ability: At the start of each battle, summon 2 Zord cards of your choice from the box. Return them to the box at the end of that battle.
